comment.author: 34427466731@N01
23103743@N05
comment._content: www.rgrossmusicautograph.com/conduct74.html has a picture of the conductor Josef Stransky, autographed in 1912. [The photos on the page are in alphabetical order,so he's near the bottom.] It looks like the same person, although younger. But he wouldn't be the first person to autograph photos at a younger age for publicity!! NYT article of Oct 6, 1912 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=980CE3D7113AE633A... indicates that he would sail for the United States on Oct 15, and was in Berlin "with his wife and mother-in-law, Mrs. William Loomis."
